Vindictus.[Letter from Allanon] Have a happy New Y:
o, this is DEV Allanon.

 

It seems like just a few days ago we welcomed the new year of 2025, and soon a month will have passed.

I am sending you my New Year's greetings, even though they're late.

 

[b][New Character Neamhain and Golden Time Event][/b]

It hasn't been long since we introduced the new character Neamhain, the boss monster Gorbas of the Glutton's Banquet, and Golden Time.

You've given us a lot of feedback, suggestions, and recommendations, and we've carefully reviewed it all.

In order to resolve the inconvenient parts of Neamhain's character, we made an additional update yesterday, January 23rd. We will also check to see if any other inconveniences remain.

There were many concerns that Neamhain might have been over-tuned, but we decided to fix her by prioritizing playability and comfort.

If objective indicators show other adjustments are needed during future balance updates, we will approach them cautiously.

There was a lot of feedback and suggestions regarding Neamhain, but there was much more buzz regarding the Golden Time event.

There were voices of support for the Golden Time item rewards and many valuable comments on the event's change to a designated-day attendance check method.

We agree with each and every one of your opinions and believe they are valid. Based on the feedback and event data you have carefully written, we will consider ways to satisfy even more players in future Golden Time events.

 

[b][Mileage Shop][/b]

There were also many inquiries about the Mileage Shop.

We think the Mileage Shop, which we are planning on adding in the July or August update, could replace the NX Reward event.

When you purchase items with NX, you will receive a certain amount of mileage points, and these points can be used to purchase desired items at the Mileage Exchange Shop, which is always open.

It will include some of the outfits previously featured in the NX Reward event, along with the Bres, Eisen Ritter outfits, Wings, and Back Ornament items.

In addition to outfits, we will work on customizing the product list to provide more options for purchasing items, including NX items such as Enhancement Runes or Enchant Runes.

In fact, the most common inquiry about the Mileage Shop is about the commonization of exclusive hair.

The commonization of exclusive hair is an item prepared as a special benefit only available at the Mileage Shop. We plan to make hairstyles that can only be worn by specific characters available to all characters of the same gender.

Since Hurk, Grimden, and Karok have different body types from other male characters, we are reviewing whether their hair can be shared, and we will push forward in a direction where they can while preserving our original intentions as much as possible.

We have also confirmed the suggestion to proceed with the commonization of Exclusive Equipment etc., but please note that we are currently only proceeding with plans for hair.

 

[b][Recollection Crystal][/b]

We also reviewed the discontinuation of the Recollection Crystal, which many of you suggested.

The Recollection Crystals, which were to provide a chance to obtain outfits that you unfortunately missed, will no longer be provided.

We have made this decision in agreement with the feedback of many players who shared negative experiences, which goes against our original intention.

 

[b][Character Utility Improvements] [/b]

While opinions on Golden Time events, hair commonization, and Recollection Crystals tended to gather attention at certain points in time, the most consistent suggestions were for character utility improvements.

The first character utility improvement update of the year is currently in the works and targeted for release in March.

In March, we plan to resolve the unreasonable play structure as before, by slightly modifying several characters.

We plan to modify characters like Lynn using the Battleshade, Arisha using the Spellwhip, Fiona using the Long Hammer, Cestus Karok, Kael, Hurk using the Teide, and Kai using the Bow.

After the March update, the next update is expected to be around June.

We will start by focusing on improving Vella, who uses the Twin Swords and Twin Chainblades, and then sequentially work on characters that need a lot of improvement. 

We ask for your understanding from players who use Vella, and we will proceed meticulously to get good results.

 

We will prepare a detailed explanation of the schedule and the contents of the updates we're unable to introduce one by one in the DevTalk before the summer update.

That DevTalk is scheduled to be released around March, but if it is delayed, we will share our progress through DevComments.

 

As this is a meaningful year that began with meeting our players face-to-face, we will work even harder to become a Vindictus that always listens to our players' voices.

Have a happy New Year in this year of the Blue Snake!

 

And thank you!

 

[b]NOTICE[/b]
[list][*]The above information and schedule are based on the Korean server. [/*][*]Please note that this includes parts that have not yet been implemented, such as improvements to Neamhain and the new raid. [/*
Vindictus.[Notice] Regarding Planned Changes to VI:
lo, this is Vindictus.

We would like to provide prior notice regarding modifications to the Aurora Effect Destiny Box, which was distributed as part of the 2024 NX Reward Event.

 

[b][Notice Details][/b]

It has been confirmed that the VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora effect displayed in-game differs slightly from the effect described in the 2024 NX Reward Event announcement.

The three VIP Premium Aurora effects showcased on the event page were recorded during the development process.

During the creation of the VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora, the blinking effect, which appears during the reactivation of the effect, was deemed unnatural.

To achieve a smoother and more natural visual effect, adjustments were made, resulting in the current Flashing Type (VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora - Pulsing Variant).

 

However, as the current VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora (Pulsing Variant) was provided without adequate explanation beforehand, we plan to resolve this issue by adding a VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora (Steady Variant) option to the box contents.

This will allow players who selected the VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora effect to choose the type they prefer and prevent any inconvenience.

The details are as follows:

 

[b][Planned Changes][/b]

[u]※ These changes will take effect after the maintenance on Thursday, February 25th.[/u]
[olist][*]The previously distributed VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora effect item will be renamed to VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora (Pulsing Variant).[/*][*]The VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora effect item in the Aurora Effect Destiny Box will be replaced with a VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora Effect Destiny Box.[/*][/olist]
 

[b]VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora Effect Destiny Box[/b]
[list][*]VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora (Pulsing Variant)[/*][*]VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora (Steady Variant)[/*][/list]
 
[list][*]Players can select and obtain one of the two types: Pulsing Variant or Steady Variant.[/*][*]Descriptions of both effects will be available on the 2024 NX Reward Event page starting February 4th; however, please note that the date is subject to change.[/*][*]Please note that the names "VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora (Pulsing Variant)" and "VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora (Steady Variant)" are tentative and may change upon final release.[/*][/list]
 


[b][Details by Player Status][/b]
[list][*]Players who have not opened the Aurora Effect Destiny Box[list][*]The contents of the box will be updated as follows, allowing players to select one of the items:[/*][*]Before February 25th Maintenance:[list][*]VIP Premium Black Aurora[/*][*]VIP Premium Gold Pentacle Aurora[/*][*]VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora (Pulsing Variant)[/*][/list][/*][*]After February 25th Maintenance:[list][*]VIP Premium Black Aurora[/*][*]VIP Premium Gold Pentacle Aurora[/*][*]VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora Effect Destiny Box[/*][/list][/*][/list][/*][*]Players who opened the Aurora Effect Destiny Box and obtained the VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora Effect before February 25th Maintenance[list][*]The VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora (Pulsing Variant) in your possession will be retrieved.[/*][*]A VIP Premium Purple Storm Aurora Effect Destiny Box will be sent to you via account mail.[/*][/list][/*][/list
Vindictus.[INTRO] Neamhain:
https://youtu.be/14G9BDL4v6U][b]GAMEPLAY TRAILER[/b][/url][b]][/b]

Click above for the trailer.

 

[b][EXCLUSIVE SKILLS][/b]

Click the skill name to check Neamhain's Exclusive Skills.

 

[url=https://youtu.be/HQ2j_E_YUzI][b]Embrace Divinity[/b][/url]

This is a skill that can be used when all Divinities have been gathered, and when fully charged, it can be chained with Divine Slash.

 

[url=https://youtu.be/uoWR0TECSKo][b]Active: Ethereal Wave[/b][/url]

This is a skill that grants the Flame of Thought status effect when attacking successfully.

Flame of Thought increases final damage by 5% for a set duration.

 

[url=https://youtu.be/ajdhHqreZ-w][b]Active: Gemini Spiral[/b][/url]

This is a skill in which you leap into the air and rapidly spin forward to deliver multiple attacks.

During the spinning attack, you can defend against enemy attacks and gain Divinity if you successfully defend.

 

[url=https://youtu.be/VZ4Imcday2Q][b]Active: Holy Vessel[/b][/url

Vindictus.[CMTY] Standard Player Guide Event:
g]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2025/q1/1337/steam_cover_img_800x450.jpg[/img]

Event Period: 1/21/2025 (Tue, after weekly maintenance) - 2/11/2025 (Tue, before weekly maintenance)

 
[b]How to Participate[/b]
You can either:A) Share small, personal tips to playing a specific character[list][*]Share tips you'd like to give to new mercenaries[/*][*]Any relevant piece of knowledge, short walkthrough or guides[/*][/list][u][/u]B) Share a detailed guide or walkthrough of mastering a specific character[list][*]Specific and detailed information on how to master the character in question[/*][*]A well-made and useful guide for newcomers to Vindictus[/*][/list]
 
[list][*][u][/u]Participation is not limited to in-game battle. Any relevant information to the character's play experience is eligible.[list][*](ex. places good to take screenshots for this character, How to move faster, Places to farm specific items that is needed, etc.)[/*][/list][/*][/list]
 

[u][/u][b]Title format[/b]
[list][*][Character in question] Title of Guide[list][*]ex. [Belle] Basic combos in battle[/*][/list][/*][/list][u][/u][u][/u][b]Must include in the guide[/b][list][*]The Character to Guide through (You must add this to the title as well)[/*][*]Your In-Game Character Name[/*][*]Your Server[/*][*]Your Participation Content[/*][/list][u][/u][u][/u][b]Rewards[/b][list][*]Participation Reward
[list][*]In-game limited title[u] [/u]'GUIDEWRIGHT'[/*][/list][/*][/list][u][/u][u][/u][b]Special Reward[/b][list][*]To the top guide per character: Discord Community Role[u] [/u]'Best Teacher'[/*][*]To the top 4 participants:[u] [/u]NX 100,000[u] [/u]x 4 Mercenaries (NA+EU)[/*][/list][u][/u][u][/u][b]Please Note[/b][list][*]The top four participants will be decided by Nexon Staff[/*][*]Unfair, irrelevant participation or participation with other people's work will not be taken into count[/*][*]There is no minimum required length to participation, and post length does not have correlation to scoring[/*][*]All guides must be up to date[/*][*]All types of media, including plain text, images, videos, GIFs, etc. are allowed to use in the guide[/*][*]All types of format, including Powerpoint, PDFs, etc. are allowed to write the guide[/*][*]All guides, relevant media and files must be posted on Discord (External URLs to a different site is not allowed, except YouTube)[/*][*]All participating guides may be used by Nexon[/*][*]You may participate in multiple characters, but you will not be rewarded more than once[/*][*]Winners will be announced and rewarded within February[/*][*]Upon announcement, additional procedures will take place for the NX rewards[/*][*]If the winner does not respond within a set period of time, you will not be able to receive your reward[/*
